entry.tran: (竞赛或比赛中的)最有可能获胜者，领先者
entry.def: In a competition or contest, the front-runner is the person who seems most likely to win it.

example.ex: Neither of the front-runners in the presidential election is a mainstream politician.
example.tran: 总统选举中的两位领先者都不是主流政治家。

means.word_mean: 1. a competitor thought likely to win
